# [Interview #112: Brisbane Signing Report - Joel Gilmore, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=112#4)

#### Robert Jordan

Ogier is pronounced OH-gee-ehr more or less, with the OH as in "so" and the gee not too much.
